data.title: Sources for Taxi Memoriam
data.meta_description: Sources for the Taxi-Library Memoriam List
data.text:
Sources for the Memoriam List

This list was current on January 1, 2024 and contains source information for 2621 occupational fatalities of taxicab drivers and drivers of liveries and taxi-like services such as Uber and Lyft. The great majority of the fatalities were homicides.

For most of the homicides, only one identified source is shown. There are additional source materials available for many of the cases. The sources are arranged in order of drivers' last names.

See also case studies on Canadian Taxicab Driver Homicides compiled by Norman Beattie of Winnipeg.

For more information, please contact: charles at taxi-library dot org. Inquiries from taxicab drivers are welcome.
